name: Kaloki
wishText: As you age, your wild heart will live for younger days;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to say.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now Dm me your views and feel free to fork my repo.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
